GetMarkedImageByIndex_AutoData_V2_CN.description: Filters files in a folder based on markers, sorts them, and loads an image by a specific index.

文件夹路径.name: Folder Path
文件夹路径.tooltip: The absolute path to the folder containing image files.

序号.name: Index
序号.tooltip: The index of the image to load from the filtered list (0-based).

排序方式.name: Sort By
排序方式.tooltip: The criteria for sorting the file list.

搜索标记.name: Search Marker
搜索标记.tooltip: Filename must contain this text. Leave empty to ignore.

排除标记.name: Exclude Marker
排除标记.tooltip: Filename must not contain this text. Leave empty to ignore.

从名称中移除搜索标记.name: Remove Search Marker from Name
从名称中移除搜索标记.tooltip: If enabled, removes the search marker from the output filename.
